mapper.sql: SELECT a.id, a.UserId, a.ProduceYear, a.ProduceDate, a.RebateMoney, a.ApplyMoney, a.Balance, a.CreateTime, a.UpdateTime FROM Rebate_Produce_t a
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Rebate_Produce_t ( UserId, ProduceYear, ProduceDate, RebateMoney, ApplyMoney, Balance, CreateTime, UpdateTime ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{produceYear}, #{produceDate}, #{rebateMoney}, #{applyMoney}, #{balance}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
